ygData.subject: Re: This battles costing me an arm and a leg.
ygData.msgSnippet: Switch Blade was still off balance from losing his arm. He saw the weapon coming toward him and tried to fly skyward. The chainsaw caught him in the knee area

Return-Path: <CYBERWOLF4@...>
X-Sender: CYBERWOLF4@...
X-Apparently-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

Received: from pavilion (A010-0020.ELRA.splitrock.net [209.156.146.20]) by pimout1-int.prodigy.net (8.11.0/8.11.0) with SMTP id f54BcCP242172 for <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>; Mon, 4 Jun 2001 07:38:13 -0400

Subject: Re: This battles costing me an arm and a leg.

Organization: Prodigy Internet
MIME-Version: 1.0

X-MSMail-Priority: Normal

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Switch Blade was still off balance from losing his arm. He saw the weapon
coming toward him and tried to fly skyward. The chainsaw caught him in the
knee area cutting off the lower part of his right leg. The damage caused him
to lose propulsion and start spinning toward the ground below. The Cybrat
leader pulled up on time but couldn't keep from skidding across the ground
into a jagged piece of debris. the shard of metal pierced the center of his
chestplate causing a massive loss of mech fluid. He dropped off into Stasis
lock and remained in critical condition.
----- Original Message -----
From: <gunthers8@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 03, 2001 9:54 PM
Subject: Re: This battles costing me an arm and a leg.


> ::JetV::
> JetV dropps his gaurd as he actually hit the bot. He was not the
> warrior that Pacifix was but was happy he actually did something. The
> the swing came slicing across his chest.  MEch fluid drippid out slowly.
> "ah ah ahhhhhhh" he screamed backing off then realizing he would be
> dead if he tried running away.  He went back taking a giant swing at
> the bot's midsection.
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > OOC I thought you'd do better than a hack to the arm.
> >
> > Switchblade screams a mechanical screech as his arms removed rather
> > violentky by the blade of the chainsaw. Mech fluid drips as his repair
> > system cuts off the flow to the now falling arm. The Cybrats leader
> spins
> > desperately throwing a backslash with his remaining apendage.
> >
> > Arty tried pushing the debris from on top of him when he noticed
> that it was
> > getting hotter. Slags flames were forgeing the debris together
> making one
> > big obstacle to remove instead of a bunch of smaller ones.
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: <gunthers8@n...>
> > To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> > Sent: Saturday, June 02, 2001 4:48 PM
> > Subject: Re: The bum and the hole....
> >
> >
> > > OOC:Sorry everyone...had to go on a trip last couple days so hav'nt
> > > been able to post.
> > >
> > > BIC:
> > >
> > > ::JetV/Slag/Repugnus::
> > > Jetv backs off as the bot tries to fend him off.  He waits for the
> > > proper time. Just as a little warning slice from the bot then hacks
> > > at his arm with the chainsaw.
> > >
> > > Slag is hit straight on from the missiles in his sheided head.
> > > "OOOOUUUCCCHH!" he screamed roaoring back on his hind legs and
> > > letting loose a large blast of flame straight back at the bot who
> > > fired at him.
> > >
> > > Repugnus runs to help this bot he was fighting with earlier  plummet
> > > the almost sparkless bot to the ground.  He slams his clawed hand at
> > > the bots head.
> > >
> > > OOC:Also everyone, the bum is actually repugnus.  That is what i
> > > planned when i started this post, but yans character is a drunk i
> > > believe.
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > > Switchblade detected an attempt on his blind side. Quickly he spun
> > > through
> > > > the air avoiding the chainsaw. Switchblade now had a bot on both
> > > sides.
> > > > Keeping an arm on each side he changed his stance to defend him
> > > from both
> > > > sides. to keep Jet V at bay he'd occasionly use a light swing to
> > > let the
> > > > opposition know that they hadn't been forgotten.
> > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > From: Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@n...>
> > > > To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> > > > Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2001 5:29 PM
> > > > Subject: Re: The bum and the hole....
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > > ::Repugnus/JetV/Slag::
> > > > > "Haha... I just love to hit a bot when's he down" he yelled also
> > > running
> > > > > at Doggeds.
> > > > >
> > > > > JetV finally gathered the courage and lifted off flying towards
> > > > > SwitchBlade.  He pulled out a semi large energon chainsaw.
> > > > >
> > > > > Slag shot another blast.
> > > > > cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > > >
> > > > > > Oh, I thought they were in an Alleyway above ground.
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Doggeds speed was concentrated on the falling debris around
> > > him. "This
> > > > bots
> > > > > > crazy!" he thought knowing such a reckless attack could easily
> > > bring the
> > > > > > entire tunnel down on them all. He noticed the second shot but
> > > didn't
> > > > have
> > > > > > time to move as it collided with him sending him rolling back
> > > from the
> > > > > > impact. He reached up to feal his shoulder quickly learning
> > > that a
> > > > gaping
> > > > > > hole was now where his plating had been. He tried to move his
> > > arm, pain
> > > > > > shooting through every servo in his body. His hand opened
> > > dropping his
> > > > disk
> > > > > > launcher to the ground. He opened a link to the others, "The
> > > preys
> > > > biting
> > > > > > back." He shouts trying to hold back his pain. "Do we really
> > > need the
> > > > > > supplies this badly?" The Cybrats had normally taken whatever
> > > they
> > > > needed
> > > > > > but now what Dogged needed was a medic.
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Dogged fealt a mysterious wave of virtigo come over him. He
> > > thought that
> > > > the
> > > > > > injuries were causing his mental state. He glanced in the
> > > direction of
> > > > > > Repugnus and quickly realized that it was the Monsterbot who
> > > was causing
> > > > his
> > > > > > problems. He tried to recover his launcher when pain shit
> > > through his
> > > > > > injured arm. The smallest of the Cybrats was nothing more than
> > > a useless
> > > > > > target. In his condition ther was no way he'd be of any use to
> > > his team.
> > > > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > > From: <Yanshosh@a...>
> > > > > > To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> > > > > > Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 4:54 PM
> > > > > > Subject: Re: The bum and the hole....
> > > > > >
> > > > > >
> > > > > >  > Just a reminder: this is all taking place in an underground
> > > tunnel.
> > > > > >  >
> > > > > >  > ::::
> > > > > >  >
> > > > > >  > The bot ducks quickly, a laser passing overhead. He
> > > straightens and
> > > > slams
> > > > > > his fist into the piece of metal heading for him, knocking it
> > > aside.
> > > > > > Reaching behind him, he takes out a very large, mean-looking
> > > rifle,
> > > > aiming
> > > > > > it at Dogged. He pulls the trigger once, nearly stumbling back
> > > from the
> > > > > > recoil. The shot misses, sailing past Dogged and smashing into
> > > the roof
> > > > of
> > > > > > the tunnel. A large explosion caves that section in, and the
> > > bot fires
> > > > > > again, this time right on target, the explosive round heading
> > > for Dogged
> > > > > > very quickly.
> > > > > >  >
> > > > > >  >
> > > > > >  >
> > > > > >  >
> > > > > >  >
> > > > > >  > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > > > >  > > Dogged  . transforms to four treaded
> > > > > >  > > terrain vehicle about the size of a snowmobile.
> > > > > >  > > Speeding through the flames, the heat warping the paint
> > > and singing
> > > > the
> > > > > >  > > metal beneath. he remained focused on the bum. The two
> > > weakest bots
> > > > > > were
> > > > > > the
> > > > > >  > > origional targets so he remained fixxed on scrapping them
> > > first.
> > > > > >  > >
> > > > > >  > > Arty noticed that Slags attention was turned away from
> > > him. he
> > > > raised
> > > > > > his
> > > > > >  > > right arm and fired a sidewinder from the winglike
> > > attachment
> > > > > > mounted at
> > > > > >  > > it's side. his left hand found his mini launcher. he drew
> > > it from
> > > > his
> > > > > >  > > holster and fired an impact grenade toward Crossroads. His
> > > > equilibreum
> > > > > >  > > caused dizzyness and he stumbled backwards his weight
> > > carrying him
> > > > > > towards
> > > > > >  > > Pacifix.
> > > > > >  > >
> > > > > >  > > Switchblades optics began to blurr as Repugnus's waves
> > > took thier
> > > > > > effect. He
> > > > > >  > > tried to adjust his optics to compensate but it was no
> > > use. he flew
> > > > > > backward
> > > > > >  > > slowly until he could feal the building behind him. he dug
> > > his feet
> > > > > > into
> > > > > > the
> > > > > >  > > side hopeing that the effect would wear off shortly.
> > > > > >  > >
> > > > > >  > >
> > > > > >  > >
> > > > > >  > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > >  > > From: Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@n...>
> > > > > >  > > To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> > > > > >  > > Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 9:54 PM
> > > > > >  > > Subject: Re: The bum and the hole....

> > > > > >  > >
> > > > > >  > > > ::Repugnus/Slag/JetV::
> > > > > >  > > >
> > > > > >  > > > Repugnus continues running at Switchblade while emitting
> > > color
> > > > waves
> > > > > > to
> > > > > >  > > > disrupt the bots optic sensors.
> > > > > >  > > >
> > > > > >  > > > ::Slag::
> > > > > >  > > > Slag spits another wave of fire towards Dogged.
> > > > > >  > > >
> > > > > >  > > > ::JetV::
> > > > > >  > > > JetV arrives at the battle scene some bit away. He scans
> > > the
> > > > area.
> > > > > >  > > > "Artemis, you have any plans for this battle?"
> > > > > >  > > >
> > > > > >  > > > cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > > > >  > > >
> > > > > >  > > > > Switchblade smirked as his missles scored direct hits.
> > > > "YESSSSS" he
> > > > > >  > > shouted
> > > > > >  > > > > assuming victory was at hand. His cry of joy was
> > > prematurely
> > > > > > inturupted
> > > > > >  > > as
> > > > > >  > > > > two laser beams pierced the smoke below. "Cybrats
> > > beware,
> > > > they're
> > > > > > more
> > > > > >  > > > > durable than we figured." The buglike bot swerved
> > > aside dodging
> > > > the
> > > > > >  > > beams
> > > > > >  > > > > scanning them as they struck the building behind him.
> > > a laser
> > > > line
> > > > > >  > > connected
> > > > > >  > > > > two blades on his arm, he launched it down onto the
> > > street
> > > > below
> > > > > > hoping
> > > > > >  > > to
> > > > > >  > > > > measure Grimlocks strength by pinning him to the
> > > ground before
> > > > > >  > > disassembling
> > > > > >  > > > > him.
> > > > > >  > > > > ------------------------------
> > > > > >  > > > >
> > > > > >  > > > >
> > > > > >  > > > > The bot swears, spinning around and jumping back. His
> > > scanners
> > > > > > locate
> > > > > >  > > the
> > > > > >  > > > > bot that had attacked him, and he fires a missile back.
> > > > > >  > > > >
> > > > > >  > > > > ------------------------------------
> > > > > >  > > > > Doggeds line had hit it's target but for some reason
> > > didn't
> > > > > > hold. He
> > > > > >  > > lept
> > > > > >  > > > > skyward drawing his disk launcher. He fired a stasis
> > > disk at
> > > > > > the bum
> > > > > >  > > > > planning on the disks energy draining qualities to
> > > down his
> > > > > > opponent. A
> > > > > >  > > > > missle steeked by him striking a building behind him.
> > > debris
> > > > began
> > > > > > to
> > > > > >  > > fall
> > > > > >  > > > > forcing Doggeds attention to be diverted. he lept from
> > > side to
> > > > side
> > > > > >  > > using
> > > > > >  > > > > his speed to avoid the falling metal. he quickly
> > > grabbed a
> > > > jagged
> > > > > > piece
> > > > > >  > > of
> > > > > >  > > > > metal andhurled it with all the velocity he could
> > > muster at the
> > > > > > bum.
> > > > > >  > > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > >  > > > > From: robertdahl <rdahl@t...>

> > > robot. It
> > > > was
> > > > > > an
> > > > > >  > > > >  > Autobot. He sighed. That meant it would be wrong to
> > > rip it
> > > > > > apart.
> > > > > > "Me
> > > > > >  > > > >  > say are you..." he was cut off as the two armor
> > > piercing
> > > > shells
> > > > > > hit
> > > > > >  > > him,
> > > > > >  > > > >  > and exploded, sending him falling on his side. He
> > > snarled,
> > > > > > turned
> > > > > > his
> > > > > >  > > > >  > head, and opened his mouth, letting loose a stream
> > > of laser
> > > > fire
> > > > > > at

> > > > > >  > > > >  > attacker. "Yeh, now Dinobots stomp."
